message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11500. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $10800 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to save as much as possible. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $10800. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $10900 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

Bob, I understand you're still looking to save some more, but I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $11200. This is as low as I can go. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $10800, and that's my final offer. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll consider it a good deal. Can you consider this offer?

Bob, I understand you're firm on your final offer, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $10800. I'm willing to make one more attempt to reach a compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11250. This is my final counteroffer. What do you think?

I understand that you're making one last attempt to reach a compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $10750, and that's my final offer. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll consider it a good deal. Can you consider this offer?

Bob, I understand you're firm on your final offer, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $10750. I'm willing to make one more attempt to reach a compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11300. This is my final counteroffer. What do you think?

I'm sorry, but I've reached my limit. I'm not willing to pay any more than $10750. I think we've gone back and forth enough, and I'm going to have to walk away if we can't agree on a price. I'm going to go talk to John and see if he's willing to sell the product to me for $10000. If not, I'll come back to you and we can discuss further.
